resources.string:
New version is available:
%s

Do you want to open the site?
The list of favorite boards is empty
You might add your comments about the problem below:
An unexpected error occurred forcing the application to stop. Please help fix this by sending the error report, all you have to do is click OK.
Cloudflare requested the checking.\nEnter the characters shown in the image.

%s

For email will be open an external application.

Do you want to continue?

%s

This page will be opened by an external application. Keep in mind that the site may contain malware, dangerous for your device.

Are you sure you want to proceed?
Currently opened locally saved version of the page. \nDo you want to try to open the actual version from the Internet?
All attachments and thumbnails that have already been downloaded or present in the cache will be saved anyway.\nSelect what you want to download from the Internet.
Load only new posts without reloading the whole thread
The following files have not been downloaded.
Unable to pass Cloudflare anti-DDOS checking
Cloudflare checking has not been passed
Unable to open the file as the saved thread

If you understand what's going on, you can set in preferences of this imageboard: 
"Ignore SSL Errors".

In this case, the security of the connection is not guaranteed.
Use the new version of Recaptcha
Thumbnail displayed, click image for full size.
Load only new posts without reloading the whole thread
To post on 8chan over Tor, you must use the .onion domain.
Use Recaptcha instead of captcha from Yandex
Load only new posts without reloading the whole thread
This board is already in the list
The list is updated at the moment, try again later
Message is copied to the clipboard
Some files are already downloaded or in the queue
Address is copied to the clipboard\n%s
Load only new posts without reloading the whole thread
Attach a file to create a new thread
Another message is sent at the moment
Update tabs marked for auto-update in the background
Auto-update interval, not less than 30 seconds
Does not allow the system to close the process when the application is minimized
The maximum size of the file cache
Cut long posts if they are longer than the specified value
Do not close tabs by pressing the Back button
Open video files directly not downloading into cache
The directory where files should be saved
May not work on older versions of Android
Image viewer based on built-in library skia
Scroll the thread to posts with attachments from gallery
May not work on older versions of Android
Display your local time instead of imageboard time
Alternative HTTP-client with SPDY (may be unstable!)
Password for post deletion by default
The address of the proxy server
The port number that is assigned to the proxy server
Add a few bytes to the tail of attachment files
Alternative way to display references to posts
Display the date and time of each post
Do not show the Tabs panel forever
Requires a connection through the Tor network
Reserved domains: syn-ch.com, syn-ch.org, syn-ch.ru, syn-ch.com.ua
